name: nvclvec

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c0, cnlm))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈ NrmVec, c0 ∈ LVec, c0 ∈ NrmMod)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, clvec))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cnvc), wa(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, clvec)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmVec → c0 ∈ LVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmVec ↔(c0 ∈ NrmMod ∧ c0 ∈ LVec))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnvc), wcel(c0, clvec))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cnvc), wa(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, clvec)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmVec → c0 ∈ LVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmVec ↔(c0 ∈ NrmMod ∧ c0 ∈ LVec))

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, cnvc), wa(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, clvec)))

comment: A normed vector space is a left vector space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
